Package com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.config

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CassandraArtifactStoreBuilder
    ArtifactStoreBuilder builder with defaults methods.
    CassandraConfig
    Configuration properties for Cassandra.
    CassandraConfig.ClientEncryptionOptions
    Client-to-node encryption protects data in flight from client machines to a database cluster using SSL (Secure Sockets Layer).
    CassandraConfig.ParameterizedClass
    Simple Holder for complex properties.
    CassandraConfig.RequestSchedulerOptions
    Request Scheduler options.
    CassandraConfig.ServerEncryptionOptions
    Node-to-node encryption protects data transferred between nodes in a cluster, including gossip communications, using SSL (Secure Sockets Layer).
    CassandraConfig.TransparentDataEncryptionOptions
    Enables encryption of data at rest (on-disk).
    CassandraDownloadConfigBuilder
    DownloadConfigBuilder builder with defaults methods.
    CassandraProcessConfig
    An Embedded Cassandra process config.
    CassandraRuntimeConfigBuilder
    RuntimeConfigBuilder builder with defaults methods.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CassandraConfig.CommitFailurePolicy
    Policy for commit disk failures.
    CassandraConfig.CommitLogSync
    Policy for commit log sync.
    CassandraConfig.DiskFailurePolicy
    Policy for data disk failures.
    CassandraConfig.DiskOptimizationStrategy
    The strategy for optimizing disk read.
    CassandraConfig.InternodeCompression
    Compression controls whether traffic between nodes is compressed.
    CassandraConfig.InternodeEncryption
    Policy for internode encryption.
    CassandraConfig.RequestSchedulerId
    Policy for request scheduler id.
